CodeplexIssue.Title: Word Window.GetPoint does not return values
CodeplexIssue.DescriptionHtml: The GetPoint function of a Word application Window object, does not return any values in NetOffice. GetPoint(int,int,int,int,object)   It should work like the interop method: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/microsoft.office.interop.word.window.getpoint(v=office.14).aspx   GetPoint(out int,out int,out int,out int,object)

CodeplexComment.Author: SebastianDotNet
CodeplexComment.BodyHtml:
the out qualifier is missing in NetOffice, its the first time i see a method with out params in ms-office.
thats the reason for i dont implement the out flag. my bad :/ i fix this bug tomorrow.
thanks for report the issue !!! *Sebastian

CodeplexComment.Author: SebastianDotNet
CodeplexComment.BodyHtml:
a nice to know update: The following table shows all methods in office applications with one or more out parameters.

Word

Word.Window.GetPoint Word.ConnectorFormat.BeginConnect Word.ConnectorFormat.EndConnect Word.DiagramNode.MoveNode Word.DiagramNode.ReplaceNode Word.DiagramNode.SwapNode Word.DiagramNode.TransferChildren

Excel

Excel.IXmlMap.ExportXml Excel._Workbook.XmlImport Excel._Workbook.XmlImportXml

PowerPoint

PowerPoint.ShapeRange.GetPolygonalRepresentation PowerPoint.TextRange.RotatedBounds

Outlook

No.entries

CodeplexComment.Author: SebastianDotNet
CodeplexComment.BodyHtml: done. an updated release is available. *have a nice day

CodeplexComment.Author: Piet123
CodeplexComment.BodyHtml: Great! Good to see this is fixed so quickly and in the same time for all other methods with output values too.
